beer.name: Mocha Porter
beer.description: Ruddy brown in color, a bittersweet balance of malt and hops with a light cream finish.
beer.grains: Northwest Harrington & Klages; 135-165, 95-115, and 70-80 Crystal; Beeston Chocolate, Black, Munich and Carastan.
Northwest Harrington & Klages; 135-165, 95-115, and 70-80 Crystal; Beeston Chocolate, Black, Munich and Carastan.
beer.yeast: Rogue's Pacman Yeast & Free Range Coastal Water.
